What is Megusta?

Megusta is a decentralized gaming platform offering Play-to-Earn tournaments with real rewards. We bridge the gap between traditional gaming and the exciting world of Web3, bringing you a unique and rewarding experience.

Our Mission

Our mission is to popularize Web3 and crypto by introducing a massive audience of casual gamers to this exciting space. We aim to do this by creating a user-friendly and engaging platform where players can enjoy fun games and earn real rewards while learning about blockchain technology.

Our Vision

We envision a future where Web3 gaming is accessible to everyone. Megusta will be at the forefront of this revolution, providing a seamless and enjoyable experience for players of all skill levels.

Our Supported Chains

  • Mantle: Currently on Mantle Sepolia Testnet. Click here to get testnet tokens.

  • Flare: Currently on Flare Coston 2 Testnet. Click here to get testnet tokens.
  • Gravity: Currently on Gravity Alpha Testnet. Contact their discord for testnet tokens.

Core Values

  • Decentralization:** Empowering players with true ownership and control.
  • Transparency:** Building trust through open and honest communication.
  • Community:** Fostering a vibrant and inclusive community of gamers.
  • Innovation:** Continuously pushing the boundaries of Web3 gaming.
